dcterms:creator: X. Ge
B. Yang

dcterms:description: A dataset containing measurements from a multi-vehicle campus shuttle system connected to cloud/fog servers via a commercial LTE network, with over 1,000,000 samples collected over three months.
dcterms:title: Multi-vehicle campus shuttle system

dcterms:creator: 5GAA White Paper
dcterms:description: A dataset containing round-trip time (RTT) measurements relevant for vehicular applications, focusing on the requirements for timely updates in connected vehicle systems.
dcterms:title: RTT (Round-Trip Time) measurements

dcterms:creator: S. Kaul
M. Gruteser
V. Rai
J. Kenney
dcterms:description: A dataset providing empirical probability density functions (PDFs) of Age of Information (AoI) in vehicular networks, used to analyze the freshness of information delivery.
dcterms:title: Empirical PDFs of AoI (Age of Information)

dcterms:creator: E. M. Tordera
X. Masip-Bruin
J. Garcia-Alminana
A. Jukan
G.-J. Ren
J. Zhu
J. Farr√©
dcterms:description: A dataset containing empirical Age of Information (AoI) measurements, which are used to evaluate the performance of information delivery in fog computing environments.
dcterms:title: Empirical AoI measurements

dcterms:creator: Y. Xiao
M. Krunz
H. Volos
T. Bando
dcterms:description: A dataset containing communication latency traces collected from smart vehicles, used to analyze and optimize latency in LTE-based fog computing for vehicular applications.
dcterms:title: Communication latency traces
